name: The Mystifying Maniacal Mythological Monsters Of Mull
name_original: The Mystifying Maniacal Mythological Monsters Of Mull
description:
The Mystifying Maniacal Mythological Monsters Of Mull

In 2013 I started work on an adventure game featuring all my sibling spawn exploring the Hebridean island of Mull (where some of my family live). It was to feature them getting into scrapes with its mythical monsters, and getting into arguments about the things that they get into arguments about. 

Unfortunately I had to give it up as it was really slow going with RPG Maker and I ran out of steam. All I had managed to do was about a third of the planned introductory section set in and around their home, though it was very polished and very cute.

This year I decided to dig it out of my digital archives, tidy up what I had done, and give it to one of my niblings for their 18th birthday.

So here it is... about 30 minutes of moderately amusing non-violent pixelated shenanigans... I hope you have fun.
